needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: Figs, prosciutto, goat cheese and a hint of truffle oil are the key ingredients that can make a pizza truly exceptional, as highlighted by the author's own personal experience with these ingredients.[4]
